mapper.select: SELECT wish.*, hi.hi_name, cc.cc_content AS country, hai.hai_city AS city, hai.hai_detail AS detail, himg.himg_file AS main_img, hgi.hgi_guest AS guest, hgi.hgi_bed AS bed, hgi.hgi_bedroom AS bedroom, hgi.hgi_bathroom AS bathroom, hgi.hgi_dog AS dog, hfi.hfi_base_price AS price, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_info rev WHERE hi.hi_seq = rev.rev_hi_seq) AS rev_cnt, rpv.total_avg FROM wish_info wish LEFT JOIN house_info hi ON hi.hi_seq = wish.wish_hi_seq LEFT JOIN house_address_info hai ON hi.hi_seq = hai.hai_hi_seq LEFT JOIN category_country cc ON hai.hai_cc_seq = cc.cc_seq LEFT JOIN house_guest_info hgi ON hi.hi_seq = hgi.hgi_hi_seq LEFT JOIN house_fee_info hfi ON hi.hi_seq = hfi.hfi_hi_seq LEFT JOIN house_img himg ON hi.hi_seq = himg.himg_hi_seq LEFT JOIN rev_point_view rpv ON rpv.rpv_hi_seq = wish.wish_hi_seq WHERE wish.wish_mi_seq = #{user_seq} AND himg.himg_main = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wish_info (wish_mi_seq, wish_hi_seq, wish_order) VALUES (#{user_seq}, #{house_seq}, #{order})
mapper.select: SELECT mi_seq, mi_name AS memeber_name, mi_description AS member_desc, cc_content AS country, mi_company AS company, mai_city AS city, mai_detail AS member_address, mimg_file AS profile_img, mi_status AS member_status, mi_host_grade AS host_grade, mi_reg_dt AS reg_dt FROM member_info mi LEFT JOIN member_address_info mai ON mi.mi_seq = mai.mai_mi_seq LEFT JOIN category_country cc ON mai.mai_cc_seq = cc.cc_seq LEFT JOIN member_img mimg on mimg.mimg_mi_seq = mi.mi_seq where mi.mi_seq = #{member_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_info (mi_id, mi_pwd, mi_name, mi_gender) VALUSES (#{mi_id}, #{mi_pwd}, #{mi_name}, #{mi_gender})
mapper.select: select mi_seq, mi_id, mi_name, mi_gender, mi_description, mi_company, mi_phone, mi_status, mi_host_grade, mi_reg_dt from member_info where mi_id = #{id} and mi_pwd = #{pwd}
select cl_content AS lang from member_info mi LEFT JOIN member_lang_info mli ON mi.mi_seq = mli.mli_mi_seq LEFT JOIN category_lang cl ON mli.mli_cl_seq = cl.cl_seq where mi.mi_seq = #{seq}
select count(*) from member_address_info where mai_mi_seq = #{mi_seq}
select mli_cl_seq from member_lang_info where mli_mi_seq = #{mi_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO airbnb_db.member_address_info (mai_mi_seq, mai_cc_seq, mai_city, mai_detail) VALUES (#{mi_seq}, #{cc_seq}, #{mai_city}, #{mai_detail})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member_report where mrpt_from_mi_seq = #{mrpt_from_mi_seq} and mrpt_to_mi_seq = #{mrpt_to_mi_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO airbnb_db.member_report (mrpt_from_mi_seq, mrpt_to_mi_seq, mrpt_type, mrpt_reason) VALUES (#{mrpt_from_mi_seq}, #{mrpt_to_mi_seq}, #{mrpt_type}, #{mrpt_reason})
mapper.select: select bi.bi_seq, bi.bi_start_dt, bi.bi_end_dt, hi.hi_seq, hi.hi_name, mi.mi_seq, mi.mi_name from booking_info bi left join house_info hi on bi.bi_hi_seq = hi.hi_seq left join member_info mi on bi.bi_mi_seq = mi.mi_seq where hi.hi_mi_seq = #{seq} and bi.bi_start_dt <= now() and bi.bi_end_dt >= now() and bi.bi_status = 2 order by bi.bi_end_dt

select bi.bi_seq, bi.bi_start_dt, bi.bi_end_dt, hi.hi_seq, hi.hi_name, mi.mi_seq, mi.mi_name from booking_info bi left join house_info hi on bi.bi_hi_seq = hi.hi_seq left join member_info mi on bi.bi_mi_seq = mi.mi_seq where hi.hi_mi_seq = #{seq} and bi.bi_start_dt >= now() and bi.bi_status = 1 order by bi.bi_start_dt

select msg.msg_seq, msg.msg_sender_mi_seq, msg.msg_content, mi.mi_name from msg_info msg left join member_info mi on msg.msg_sender_mi_seq = mi.mi_seq where msg.msg_type = 13 and msg.msg_receiver_mi_seq = #{seq}
